item.title: Microk8s Cluster: SQLite Backups Using RSYNC
item.description: Problem statement I have a NAS server running on a Raspberry Pi with automatic backups. That Pi also acts as an NFS server, and the thicket (my Raspberry Pi microk8s cluster) uses the nfs-client storage driver to create persistent volume claims so that the thicket can take advantage of the automatic backups as well.
